dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: ...Go away. Don't bother poking at me.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: I can't tell what time it is if the sun doesn't get in... Oi, is it morning now?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: When I wake up after falling asleep in these clothes... I find myself in garbage-filled alleyways like here. It's a place that's just like me.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: You'd better sleep early. If it gets too late... it sometimes becomes too cold to fall asleep.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Don't loiter before my eyes like that, you're being a nuisance... I can beat you down with this old umbrella.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
...Name? Didn't give one. It might leave my side whenever.
...Don't give me that glance.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Plenty of dark corners in the Backstreets... This one lets me relax the most.
No one walks by, and no one gives me attention.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Don't act all cocky. I'll destroy every technology in the world with my hands.
...If you get in my way, I'll stab you then and there.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Umbrellas are handy...
I'm not expecting anything from you. Just… go on and try it. I’ll show you how much it hurts to have ragged broken ribs from a dumped umbrella jammed in you.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Hmph. Done playing around with me?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Go on and pretend to be nice all you want... I'll stay wary and suspicious of you until all technology is liberated.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: ...For a free world.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I'll crush 'em alright.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: ...What?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I'll beat you to a pulp.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Haha, look at 'em slip.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Dammit!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: All messed up, eh.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Not yet... I've still got things to do...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Well, it was simple, eh?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I didn't do that on purpose. You know that, right?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: For the abandoned...

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Haah~ I tried a bit harder.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Tch... Failed again. You gonna throw me away?
